titleStmt.title: Certayne versis, writtene by Thomas Brooke Ge[n]tleman, in the tyme of his impryso[n]ment, the daye before his deathe, who sufferyd at Norwich, the. 30. of August. 1570
titleStmt.author: Brooke, Thomas, d. 1570.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the paryshe of Saynct Andrewe by Anthony de Solempne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
